Staff

Jump to: Instructors, Teaching Assistants, Readers.

Note: Consult the calendar for the most up-to-date office hours for each GSI.

Course Staff Email

Contact course staff at data100.instructors@berkeley.edu with any questions or concerns. This email is monitored by instructors and a few lead TAs.
